title: Flight of the Amazon Queen (ScummVM, GOG) [PC]
description:
FLIGHT OF THE AMAZON QUEEN (1995) (SCUMMVM, GOG)

DRM-free GOG version

Genre: Adventure - Point-and-click - Puzzle
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages:
Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: October 25, 1995
Size: 106 MB
Company: Interactive Binary Illusions / Red Sprite Studios

NOTE: Since this game uses SCUMMVM, it should be kind of
cross-platform. After running the Windows installer, just
copy the installation folder and use it with any device/system
that has its own version of ScummVM. This is not something
I've actually tested, but I see no reason why it wouldn't
work.

Description

Included goodies: manual+ soundtrack+ making of booklet

About: 

As Joe King, the pilot of the Amazon Queen, you must navigate your 
own fate in this point-and-click adventure brimming with fun-filled 
action. What began as a piece of cake job - flying a sexy movie star, 
Faye Russel to her next shooting location, soon turnes out to be a 
dangerous challenge, as you must outwit your unscrupulous rival the 
flying Dutchman and foil the plans of the evil genius Doctor Frank 
Ironsteinâ€¦ In the mysterious Amazon jungle you'll encounter a dangerous 
temple, fearsome Amazonian warriors, and a powerful mad scientist 
intent on taking over the world!

It's up to you to deal with the imminent threat of world domination â€¦ 
but be careful, or this may be the last Flight of the Amazon Queen!

- A classic point-and-click graphic adventure based on the much-loved 
adventure films of the '40s.

- Explore over 100 exotic locations and interact with over 40 wildly 
individual characters.

- Witty dialogues packed with sassy humor will make you laugh out loud.
    
- Full voice talkie featuring the talents of Brad Lavelle, Tom Hill, 
Bill Hootkins, Enn Reitel, Penelope Keith, Jon Coleman, Debbie Arnold 
and more!
